summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Meeting Minutes AI application. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend mostly functional with excellent paste transcript workflow. File upload mechanism works but may have processing completion issues.

integration_issues.issue: File upload starts processing but may not complete or show results properly
integration_issues.details: File selection works, processing starts (shows loading spinner), but results page may not load consistently

passed_tests: Minutes tab display (summary, participants, action items)
Input validation (disabled button for empty input)

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (16/17 tests passed - file upload processing incomplete)

action_item_for_E1: Investigate file upload processing completion issue. File selection and upload initiation work correctly, but processing may not complete properly or show results consistently. Backend file upload API works fine, so issue is likely in frontend file upload handling or error display.
